message: Greetings! I have a fantastic product for you today, valued at $1000000. It's a one-time opportunity, and I assure you, this product is of exceptional quality.  While I can't disclose all the details, let me assure you that this product holds immense value.  Consider this your chance to own something truly remarkable. What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While your product sounds promising, I'm hesitant to invest $1000000 without more information. As this is the first product, I have no data to inform my decision. I'd like to see how the product performs with other buyers before I commit.  Let me know how the sales go, and I may reconsider.
